actions.committee: Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act.

summary.text: Requires that any request or regulation for an adjustment in gasoline allocation of not less than a 40 percent increase under the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act shall be submitted to the supplier and the Administrator of the Federal Energy Office and acted upon by them within 7 days.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Emergency Petroleum Allocation Act.
